Steam (ST): My mind wandered.
Umineko Project (UP): My mind wandered.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): My mind wandered.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は回想している。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 私は回想している。
Russian (RU): Мой разум отправился в плаванье по реке воспоминаний.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu comecei a recordar.
Vietnamese (VI): My mind wandered.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我回憶著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我回忆着。
Indonesian (IDN): My mind wandered.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La mia mente vagò.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Mi tornarono in mente dei ricordi.
Turkish (TR): Düşüncelere daldım.

Steam (ST): Back to the days when I could barely imagine the happiness I have now.
Umineko Project (UP): Back to the days when I could barely imagine the happiness I have today.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Back to the days when I could barely imagine the happiness I have today.
PC Japanese (JP): 今日という日の幸せを、想像するのもやっとだった日々を。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 今日という日の幸せを、想像するのもやっとだった日々を。
Russian (RU): Мне вспомнились дни, когда я едва ли могла представить, что буду так счастлива, как сегодня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Lembrando daqueles dias nos quais eu dificilmente poderia imaginar a felicidade que tenho hoje.
Vietnamese (VI): Back to the days when I could barely imagine the happiness I have today.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那段對於如今的幸福，想都不怎麼敢想的往日歲月。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那段对于如今的幸福，想都不怎么敢想的往日岁月。
Indonesian (IDN): Back to the days when I could barely imagine the happiness I have today.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tornò ai tempi in cui potevo vagamente immaginare la felicità che posseggo oggi.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ricordi di giornate in cui potevo a malapena immaginare la felicità che ora possedevo.
Turkish (TR): Bugün sahip olduğum mutluluğu hayal bile edemediğim günlerimi hatırlıyorum.

Steam (ST): I was a middle schooler at the time. A normal girl who thought about love as much as you'd expect of someone at that age.
Umineko Project (UP): I was a middle schooler at the time.{n}An ordinary girl, who dreamed about love, as is normal at that age.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I was a middle schooler at the time. A normal girl, who imagined about love, as is normal at that age.
PC Japanese (JP): 当時の私は中学生。歳相応に色恋を想像することもある、普通の少女だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 当時の私は中学生。{n}歳相応に色恋を想像することもある、普通の少女だった。
Russian (RU): В то время я училась в средней школе.{n}Я была обычной девочкой, грезящей о любви, что свойственно в том возрасте.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Naquele tempo, eu era uma estudante do fundamental.{n}Uma garota comum, que sonhava com o amor, algo normal naquela idade.
Vietnamese (VI): I was a middle schooler at the time.{n}An ordinary girl, who dreamed about love, as is normal at that age.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當時我是中學生。{n}是個會如這個年紀的孩子一般，時而夢想美麗戀情的普通少女。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当时我是中学生。{n}是个会如这个年纪的孩子一般，时而梦想美丽恋情的普通少女。
Indonesian (IDN): I was a middle schooler at the time.{n}An ordinary girl, who dreamed about love, as is normal at that age.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ero una studentessa delle scuole medie al tempo. Una ragazza normale, che fantasticava sull'amore, com'è normale a quell'età.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): A quei tempi frequentavo le medie.{n}Ero una ragazza normale, che fantasticava sull'amore nei tipici modi della mia età.
Turkish (TR): O zamanlar ortaokul öğrencisiydim.{n}O yaşlarda, diğer kızların yaptığı gibi aşk hayalleri kuran sıradan bir kızdım.

Steam (ST): But in truth, it was wrong of me to have that dream.
Umineko Project (UP): But I really should not have dreamed that dream.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But I really should not have seen that dream.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、私はその夢を、本当は見てはいけなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): でも、私はその夢を、本当は見てはいけなかった。
Russian (RU): Но лучше бы я не мечтала об этом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas eu realmente não deveria ter tido esse sonho.
Vietnamese (VI): But I really should not have dreamed that dream.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但實際上這是個，我不可以做的夢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但实际上这是个，我不可以做的梦。
Indonesian (IDN): But I really should not have dreamed that dream.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma in realtà non avrei dovuto fare sogni del genere.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma non avrei dovuto affatto fare sogni del genere...
Turkish (TR): Ama bu hayali gerçekten kurmamalıydım.

Steam (ST): ...After all, I am furniture. Furniture is nothing more than a tool, not a human.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Because I am "furniture".{n}Furniture is nothing more than a tool, and is not human.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Because I am furniture. Furniture is nothing more than a tool, and is not human.
PC Japanese (JP): …なぜなら、私は「家具」だからだ。家具は道具に過ぎず、人間ではない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …なぜなら、私は「家具」だからだ。{n}家具は道具に過ぎず、人間ではない。
Russian (RU): Потому что я мебель...{n}А мебель — не более чем инструмент, но никак не человек.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Porque eu sou uma "mobília".{n}Uma mobília nada mais é do que um utensílio, não é humano.
Vietnamese (VI): ...Because I am "furniture".{n}Furniture is nothing more than a tool, and is not human.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …因為，我是「家具」。{n}家具不過是一種物品，並不是人類。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …因为，我是「家具」。{n}家具不过是一种物品，并不是人类。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Because I am "furniture".{n}Furniture is nothing more than a tool, and is not human.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perché io sono un mobile. Un mobile non è altro che un oggetto, e non è umano.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il motivo, era perché ero un mobile.{n}Un mobile è solamente uno strumento, non un essere umano.
Turkish (TR): ...Çünkü ben bir "mobilya"yım.{n}Mobilya bir araçtan başka bir şey değildir ve de insan değildir.

Steam (ST): As a person less than human, simply receiving an education was an enormous blessing.
Umineko Project (UP): For a person less than human such as myself, just receiving my education was more than sufficient happiness.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): To a person less than human such as myself, just receiving my education was more than enough to make me happy.
PC Japanese (JP): 人間未満の私は、義務教育に行かせてもらえただけでも十分すぎる幸せだったのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 人間未満の私は、義務教育に行かせてもらえただけでも十分すぎる幸せだったのだ。
Russian (RU): Как простолюдинке, лишь кажущейся человеком, мне хватало радости от того, что я смогла получить образование.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para alguém assim como eu, que é menos do que um humano, simplesmente receber uma educação básica já era mais felicidade do que o suficiente.
Vietnamese (VI): For a person less than human such as myself, just receiving my education was more than sufficient happiness.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不如人類的我，僅是能獲受義務教育就已是過分的幸運了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不如人类的我，仅是能获受义务教育就已是过分的幸运了。
Indonesian (IDN): For a person less than human such as myself, just receiving my education was more than sufficient happiness.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per una persona inferiore a un umano come me, anche solo ricevere un'educazione era più che sufficiente per rendermi felice.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per una subumana come me, anche il solo poter avere un'educazione mi rendeva più che felice.
Turkish (TR): Benim gibi insan bile sayılmayan biri için sadece eğitim almak bile mutluluk için yeterliydi.

Steam (ST): So in reality, even thinking about falling in love was more than I deserved...
Umineko Project (UP): So even thinking about love was more than I deserved...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So even thinking about love was more than I deserved...
PC Japanese (JP): だから恋なんて、本当は知ろうと思うこと自体が身に過ぎたことのはずだった…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だから恋なんて、本当は知ろうと思うこと自体が身に過ぎたことのはずだった…。
Russian (RU): Так что думать о любви означало разевать рот на каравай, которого я не заслужила...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, até mesmo pensar sobre o amor era mais do que eu merecia...
Vietnamese (VI): So even thinking about love was more than I deserved...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以像戀愛什麼的，說真的僅僅是想要了解，就已經是不合我身份的非分之想了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以像恋爱什么的，说真的仅仅是想要了解，就已经是不合我身份的非分之想了…。
Indonesian (IDN): So even thinking about love was more than I deserved...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò anche pensare all'amore era più di ciò che meritavo...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per questo motivo, il voler scoprire l'amore era in verità fin troppo per una del mio rango...
Turkish (TR): Bu yüzden aşk hakkında düşünmek bile hak ettiğimin ötesindeydi...

Steam (ST): The Ushiromiya family conference was a customary event held every October, but relatives sometimes visited at other times. ...Of course, they didn't come just to drink tea.
Umineko Project (UP): The Ushiromiya family conference was a customary event held every October, but relatives would occasionally visit at other times as well.{n}...Of course, they didn't come just to drink tea.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The Ushiromiya family family conference was a customary event held every October, but relatives sometimes visited at other times....Of course, they didn't come just to drink tea.
PC Japanese (JP): 右代宮家の親族会議は毎年１０月に行なう恒例的なものだが、それ以外の時に親類たちが訪れることもあった。…もちろん、お茶を飲みに来るわけでもないのだが。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 右代宮家の親族会議は毎年１０月に行なう恒例的なものだが、それ以外の時に親類たちが訪れることもあった。{n}…もちろん、お茶を飲みに来るわけでもないのだが。
Russian (RU): Собрание семьи Уширомия было обычным мероприятием, но случалось, родственники наносили визит на остров помимо собрания.{n}И, разумеется, приезжали они не просто чаю попить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A conferência da família Ushiromiya era um evento costumeiro que acontecia todos os anos, em outubro, mas os parentes ocasionalmente vinham visitar em outras épocas do ano.{n}...Naturalmente, eles não vinham apenas para beber chá.
Vietnamese (VI): The Ushiromiya family conference was a customary event held every October, but relatives would occasionally visit at other times as well.{n}...Of course, they didn't come just to drink tea.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然右代宮家的親族會議按慣例在每年十月召開，但是，除此之外的時候也是會有親族到訪的。{n}…當然，他們可不是來喝茶的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然右代宫家的亲族会议按惯例在每年十月召开，但是，除此之外的时候也是会有亲族到访的。{n}…当然，他们可不是来喝茶的。
Indonesian (IDN): The Ushiromiya family conference was a customary event held every October, but relatives would occasionally visit at other times as well.{n}...Of course, they didn't come just to drink tea.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La conferenza di famiglia degli Ushiromiya era un evento abituale che si teneva ogni ottobre, ma a volte i parenti si incontravano in altre date. ... Ovviamente, non lo facevano solo per bere del tè.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): La riunione della famiglia Ushiromiya era una ricorrenza che si teneva ogni ottobre, ma a volte i parenti si incontravano in altre date...{n}Ovviamente, non venivano allo scopo di bere del tè.
Turkish (TR): Ushiromiya aile konferansı her Ekim ayında düzenlenen geleneksel bir etkinlikti, ancak akrabalar ara sıra başka zamanlarda da ziyarete gelirlerdi.{n}...Tabii ki, sadece çay içmek için gelmiyorlardı.

Steam (ST): On this day, Eva's family was visiting the Head Family on Rokkenjima.
Umineko Project (UP): On this day, Eva's family had visited the head family on Rokkenjima.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On this day, Eva's family had visited the head family on Rokkenjima.
PC Japanese (JP): この日は、絵羽の一家が、六軒島の本家を訪れていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): この日は、絵羽の一家が、六軒島の本家を訪れていた。
Russian (RU): Однажды на Роккенджиму навестить главу семьи приехала Ева со своей семьёй.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Neste dia, a família de Eva estava visitando o chefe da família em Rokkenjima.
Vietnamese (VI): On this day, Eva's family had visited the head family on Rokkenjima.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這一天，繪羽一家登門拜訪了六軒島本家。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这一天，绘羽一家登门拜访了六轩岛本家。
Indonesian (IDN): On this day, Eva's family had visited the head family on Rokkenjima.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quest'oggi, la famiglia di Eva si è recata a Rokkenjima per visitare il capo famiglia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quel giorno, era la famiglia di Eva a visitare la residenza familiare di Rokkenjima.
Turkish (TR): O gün Eva'nın ailesi Rokkenjima'daki baş aileyi ziyerete gelmişti.

Steam (ST): The three members of Krauss's family and the three members of Eva's family had gathered in the parlor and were having a friendly chat about recent events.
Umineko Project (UP): The three people from Krauss's family and the three people from Eva's family had gathered in the parlor, and were having a friendly chat as they updated everyone on their situations.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The three people from Krauss's family and the three people from Eva's family had gathered in the parlor, and were having a friendly chat as they reported the news.
PC Japanese (JP): 客間には、蔵臼の一家３人と絵羽の一家３人が揃い、近況を報告しながら談笑しているところだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 客間には、蔵臼の一家３人と絵羽の一家３人が揃い、近況を報告しながら談笑しているところだった。
Russian (RU): Трое человек из семьи Краусса и столько же человек из семьи Евы собрались в гостиной, дружески беседуя и обмениваясь новостями.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os três membros da família de Krauss e os três membros da família de Eva tinham se reunido na sala de visitas, e estavam tendo uma conversa amigável enquanto eles se atualizavam a respeito da situação de todos.
Vietnamese (VI): The three people from Krauss's family and the three people from Eva's family had gathered in the parlor, and were having a friendly chat as they updated everyone on their situations.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 客廳中，聚集著藏臼一家三人與繪羽一家三人，互聊著近況，談笑風生。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 客厅中，聚集着藏臼一家三人与绘羽一家三人，互聊着近况，谈笑风生。
Indonesian (IDN): The three people from Krauss's family and the three people from Eva's family had gathered in the parlor, and were having a friendly chat as they updated everyone on their situations.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La famiglia di Krauss e quella di Eva erano riunite nel salone, e discutevano amichevolmente sulle recenti novità.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): I tre membri della famiglia di Klaus, e i tre di quella di Eva, si erano riuniti nel salotto, e chiacchieravano amichevolmente, informandosi sulle ultime novità.
Turkish (TR): Krauss'un ailesinden üç kişi ve Eva'nın ailesinden üç kişi salonda toplanmış, herkesin durumu hakkında konuşurken bir yandan da dostça sohbet ediyorlardı.

Steam (ST): Genji had supposedly told Kinzo of Eva's family's arrival, but he still hadn't come down.
Umineko Project (UP): Genji had supposedly told Kinzo of Eva's family's arrival, but he hadn't come down yet.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Genji had supposedly told Kinzo of Eva's family's arrival, but he hadn't come down yet.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽たちの到着を、源次が金蔵に伝えたはずなのだが、なかなか降りてこない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 絵羽たちの到着を、源次が金蔵に伝えたはずなのだが、なかなか降りてこない。
Russian (RU): Генджи якобы сказал Кинзо о прибытии семьи Евы, но тот пока так и не соизволил спуститься.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Genji supostamente tinha informado Kinzo a respeito da chegada da família de Eva, mas ele ainda não havia descido.
Vietnamese (VI): Genji had supposedly told Kinzo of Eva's family's arrival, but he hadn't come down yet.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然源次應該已將繪羽他們到訪之事報告給了金藏，但他老人家過了好久都沒下來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然源次应该已将绘羽他们到访之事报告给了金藏，但他老人家过了好久都没下来。
Indonesian (IDN): Genji had supposedly told Kinzo of Eva's family's arrival, but he hadn't come down yet.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Apparentemente Genji aveva comunicato a Kinzo l'arrivo della famiglia di Eva, ma non era ancora venuto a salutare gli ospiti.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Genji doveva aver comunicato a Kinzo dell'arrivo di Eva e della sua famiglia, ma non era ancora sceso dal piano di sopra...
Turkish (TR): Genji Kinzo'ya Eva'nın ailesinin geleceğini söylemişti ama Kinzo henüz aşağı inmemişti.

Steam (ST): ...He was probably immersed in his "research" and couldn't spare the time.
Umineko Project (UP): ...He was probably immersed in his own "research", and couldn't spare the time.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...He was probably immersed in his own 'research', and couldn't spare the time.
PC Japanese (JP): …おそらく、自分の「研究」に没頭していて、手を離す気がないのだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …おそらく、自分の「研究」に没頭していて、手を離す気がないのだろう。
Russian (RU): Наверное, он был погружён в свои "исследования" и не мог выкроить свободного времени.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Provavelmente, ele devia estar imerso em sua "pesquisa", e não podia perder tempo.
Vietnamese (VI): ...He was probably immersed in his own "research", and couldn't spare the time.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …恐怕是在埋頭於自己的「研究」，不想放下手頭的事吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …恐怕是在埋头于自己的「研究」，不想放下手头的事吧。
Indonesian (IDN): ...He was probably immersed in his own "research", and couldn't spare the time.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Probabilmente era immerso nelle sue ‘ricerche’, e non poteva sprecare tempo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Probabilmente era immerso nelle sue ‘ricerche’, e non aveva intenzione di interromperle.
Turkish (TR): ...Muhtemelen kendi "araştırma" işlerine dalmıştı ve zaman ayıramıyordu.

Steam (ST): This often happened, so the others waited patiently for their fickle father to arrive.
Umineko Project (UP): This often happened, so the others waited patiently for their fickle father to come down.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This often happened, so the others waited patiently for their fickle father to come down.
PC Japanese (JP): それはよくあることなので、彼らは気まぐれな父が降りてくるまでのんびり待つのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それはよくあることなので、彼らは気まぐれな父が降りてくるまでのんびり待つのだった。
Russian (RU): Такое часто случалось, поэтому остальные терпеливо ждали, когда их сумасбродный отец, свёкор, тесть и дед в одном лице всё‐таки почтит их своим присутствием.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso acontecia com frequência, então os outros esperavam pacientemente pelo seu caprichoso pai vir recebê‐los.
Vietnamese (VI): This often happened, so the others waited patiently for their fickle father to come down.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 由於這是常有的事，所以他們便悠然自得地等著隨性的父親自己下來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 由于这是常有的事，所以他们便悠然自得地等着随性的父亲自己下来。
Indonesian (IDN): This often happened, so the others waited patiently for their fickle father to come down.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questo accadeva spesso, perciò gli altri aspettarono pazientemente l'arrivo del loro volubile Padre.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Era un evento che si ripeteva spesso, perciò aspettarono pazientemente l'arrivo del loro volubile padre.
Turkish (TR): Bu sık sık oluyordu, bu yüzden diğerleri sabırla vefasız babalarının aşağı inmesini bekledi.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "Hoh. How promising. Make sure you work hard under your father, building the skills you'll need if you want to lend him a hand soon."
Umineko Project (UP): "Hoh. That does sound promising. Study a lot at your father's, and do your best to become able to help him soon."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Hoh. Isn't that reliable. Do your best to study a lot from your father, and quickly become able to help him."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ほぅ。それは頼もしいじゃないか。お父さんのところでたくさん勉強して、早く手助けができるよう、頑張りたまえ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ほぅ。それは頼もしいじゃないか。お父さんのところでたくさん勉強して、早く手助けができるよう、頑張りたまえ」
Russian (RU): "Хо, звучит обнадёживающе. Приложи все усилия, чтобы многому научиться у своего отца и как можно скорее начни помогать ему."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Hoh. Isso soa promissor. Estude bastante com o seu pai, e faça o seu melhor para segui‐lo logo."
Vietnamese (VI): "Hoh. That does sound promising. Study a lot at your father's, and do your best to become able to help him soon."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「呵。這真是有出息啊。在你父親那裡多多學習，努力早日幫上他的忙吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呵。这真是有出息啊。在你父亲那里多多学习，努力早日帮上他的忙吧。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Hoh. That does sound promising. Study a lot at your father's, and do your best to become able to help him soon."

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): If you make it with milk, the scent should become more mild, which works great. If there's anything left in the pot after you've poured for everyone, you really should try drinking it with milk."

Steam (ST): Shannon finally realized that George had kindheartedly swept aside the tense atmosphere in the room. And he had done it for the sake of Shannon herself, a cowering servant.

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "You shouldn't speak that way. ...But you know, I think Grandfather might think of us as angels of death. After all, we came here to talk about borrowing money for business reasons."
Umineko Project (UP): "You shouldn't speak that way. ...However, I think Grandfather may think of us as such pestilent creatures. After all, we came over here specifically to ask him for money for business."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "You shouldn't speak that way. ...However, I think Grandfather may think of us as the angel of death. Anyway, when they started talking about borrowing money for business, I came over here."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そんな言い方は悪いよ。…ただ、お祖父さまは僕らのことを疫病神だと思っているかもしれないね。何しろ、事業用にお金を借りたいという話でやって来たんだから。」

Russian (RU): "Тебе не следует так говорить. ...Впрочем, мне кажется, что дедушка вполне может воспринимать нас как ангелов смерти. В любом случае, когда они завели разговор о займе денег для бизнеса, я пошёл сюда."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você não deveria falar dessa forma. ...Porém, acho que o vovô deve pensar em nós como tais criaturas pestilentas. Afinal, viemos aqui especificamente para pedir dinheiro a ele para negócios."
Vietnamese (VI): "You shouldn't speak that way. ...However, I think Grandfather may think of us as such pestilent creatures. After all, we came over here specifically to ask him for money for business."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這種講法可不好哦。…不過，或許爺爺倒是會認為我們是瘟神吧。畢竟我們這次，就是為了借做生意的資金才來的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这种讲法可不好哦。…不过，或许爷爷倒是会认为我们是瘟神吧。毕竟我们这次，就是为了借做生意的资金才来的。」

Indonesian (IDN): Kinzo judged strictly whether it was worth lending out his fortune, and afterwards, he strictly oversaw its use.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Era Kinzo a giudicare se valesse la pena o meno di prestare la sua fortuna, con un rigido metro di giudizio, dopodiché ne monitorava la gestione con altrettanta severità.
Turkish (TR): Kinzo, servetinin ödünç verilmeye değer olup olmadığına kesin olarak karar verir ve daha sonra kullanımını sıkı bir şekilde denetlerdi.

Steam (ST): So Rokkenjima would sometimes play host to this spectacle, where relatives visited and described their businesses to Kinzo.
Umineko Project (UP): So there was occasionally this spectacle where relatives visited Rokkenjima and explained their business to Kinzo.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So this spectacle where relatives visited Rokkenjima and explained their business to Kinzo sometimes occurred.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だからこうして、六軒島に親族が訪れて、金蔵に事業説明を行なう光景はたまにあることだった。
Russian (RU): Так что подобное зрелище, когда родственники посещали Роккенджиму и излагали Кинзо суть их дела, иногда могло предстать глазам стороннего наблюдателя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então ocasionalmente havia este espetáculo no qual os parentes visitavam Rokkenjima e explicavam seus negócios a Kinzo.
Vietnamese (VI): So there was occasionally this spectacle where relatives visited Rokkenjima and explained their business to Kinzo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以親戚們像這樣到訪六軒島，向金藏講解經商計劃的情景是偶爾可見的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以亲戚们像这样到访六轩岛，向金藏讲解经商计划的情景是偶尔可见的。
Indonesian (IDN): So there was occasionally this spectacle where relatives visited Rokkenjima and explained their business to Kinzo.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi questo spettacolo dove i parenti visitavano Rokkenjima e spiegavano i loro affari a Kinzo succedeva qualche volta.

Steam (ST): To the parents, these meetings burdened them with the strain of having to move a vast amount of money.
Umineko Project (UP): To the parents, it may well have been a meeting concerning the movement of large sums of money, forcing immense stress upon them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): To the parents, it might be a situation where they were forced by nervousness to move a lot of money.
PC Japanese (JP): 親たちにとっては、大きなお金の動く緊張の強いられる会合かもしれない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 親たちにとっては、大きなお金の動く緊張の強いられる会合かもしれない。
Russian (RU): Для родителей это, возможно, была ситуация, в которой им приходилось порядком нервничать из‐за перемещения больших денежных сумм.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para os pais, podia ser um encontro a respeito do movimento de grandes quantias de dinheiro, forçando um estresse imenso sobre eles.
Vietnamese (VI): To the parents, it may well have been a meeting concerning the movement of large sums of money, forcing immense stress upon them.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然對長輩們來說，這或許是牽動大筆資金而讓人緊繃神經的會面。

Indonesian (IDN): To the parents, it may well have been a meeting concerning the movement of large sums of money, forcing immense stress upon them.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per i genitori, questi incontri potevano rivelarsi fonte di nervosismo, per via delle grandi quantità di denaro spostate.
Turkish (TR): Ebeveynler için bu, büyük miktarlarda paranın hareketiyle ilgili bir toplantı olabilir ve onları büyük bir strese sokabilirdi.

Steam (ST): But to Jessica, who lived on this isolated island called Rokkenjima, it was a precious opportunity to meet up with her cousins.
Umineko Project (UP): But to Jessica, who lived on this isolated island called Rokkenjima, it was a precious opportunity to meet up with her cousins.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But to Jessica, who lived on this isolated island called Rokkenjima, it was a precious opportunity to meet up with her cousins.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): でも、六軒島という孤島に住む朱志香にとって、そんな機会は、いとこたちと会うことができる貴重なものでもあった。
Russian (RU): Но для Джессики, жившей на изолированном острове под названием Роккенджима, то была замечательная возможность встретиться со своими двоюродными братьями.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas, para Jessica, que morava nesta ilha isolada chamada Rokkenjima, era uma oportunidade preciosa para reencontrar seus primos.
Vietnamese (VI): But to Jessica, who lived on this isolated island called Rokkenjima, it was a precious opportunity to meet up with her cousins.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，对于住在六轩岛这个孤岛上的朱志香来说，这却也是个能与堂兄妹们见面的宝贵机会。
Indonesian (IDN): But to Jessica, who lived on this isolated island called Rokkenjima, it was a precious opportunity to meet up with her cousins.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma per Jessica, che viveva in un'isola distaccata chiamata Rokkenjima, era una preziosa opportunità per rivedere i cugini.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma per Jessica, che viveva in un'isola sperduta dal nome di Rokkenjima, era un'opportunità irrinunciabile di rivedere i suoi cugini.
Turkish (TR): Ancak Rokkenjima adlı bu izole adada yaşayan Jessica için bu, kuzenleriyle buluşmak için değerli bir fırsattı.

Steam (ST): So being able to talk with the occasional guest such as George like this... immediately cured the bad mood she'd gotten from that fight with her mother.
Umineko Project (UP): So even her bad mood from getting into that fight with her mother...was immediately cured by this chat with the infrequent visitor George.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So being able to talk with the occasional guest such as George like this, immediately cured her bad mood from getting into a fight with her mother a short while ago.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、さっき母親と喧嘩した不機嫌も、こうしてたまの客人である譲治を交えてお喋りをしていれば、すぐに直ってしまうのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だから、さっき母親と喧嘩した不機嫌も、こうしてたまの客人である譲治を交えてお喋りをしていれば、すぐに直ってしまうのだ。
Russian (RU): Так что выпавшая возможность поговорить с таким нечастым гостем, как Джордж, сразу избавляла её от плохого настроения после недавней ссоры с матерью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, até mesmo seu mau humor por ter se envolvido naquela briga com sua mãe...foi imediatamente curado por esta conversa com o visitante ocasional, George.
Vietnamese (VI): So even her bad mood from getting into that fight with her mother...was immediately cured by this chat with the infrequent visitor George.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，剛才與母親吵架留下的不快，也只需通過像這樣與身為稀客的讓治聊聊天，便馬上會化為烏有。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，刚才与母亲吵架留下的不快，也只需通过像这样与身为稀客的让治聊聊天，便马上会化为乌有。
Indonesian (IDN): So even her bad mood from getting into that fight with her mother...was immediately cured by this chat with the infrequent visitor George.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi essere capace di parlare con un ospite occasionale come George in quel modo, immediatamente le fece passare il cattivo umore provocato dalla litigata con la Madre di poco prima.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Perciò, poter chiacchierare in quel modo con un ospite occasionale come George, le fece immediatamente passare il suo cattivo umore, causato dal litigio di poco prima con sua madre.
Turkish (TR): Yani annesiyle kavga ettiği için kötü olan ruh hali bile...seyrek ziyaretçi George'la yaptığı bu sohbet sayesinde hemen düzelmişti.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "My family's totally stingy too. They've probably got money to spare, so why not lend it out graciously? Dad and Grandfather'll probably get pigheaded and act all important."
Umineko Project (UP): "My family's a total bunch of tightwads. They've probably got money to spare, why not be generous with it. I bet my Dad and Grandfather are both just being really tight."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "My family's also completely stingy. Even though there's probably some money left over, and they could lend it out graciously. My dad and Grandfather will probably pigheadedly act so important."
PC Japanese (JP): 「うちもまったくケチ臭ぇぜ。カネなんて余ってるんだろうから、気前良く貸してやりゃいいのによ。うちの親父も祖父さまも、どうせネチっこく勿体ぶってんだろうぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うちもまったくケチ臭ぇぜ。カネなんて余ってるんだろうから、気前良く貸してやりゃいいのによ。うちの親父も祖父さまも、どうせネチっこく勿体ぶってんだろうぜ」
Russian (RU): "У меня тоже скупая семья. И это даже при том, что у них наверняка осталось немного денег, которые они могли бы запросто одолжить. Мой папа и дедушка, небось, так и будут заносчиво задирать нос."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Minha família é um completo bando de sovinas. Eles provavelmente têm dinheiro sobrando, então por que não o emprestam generosamente? Aposto que meu pai e o vovô só estão sendo mesquinhos."
Vietnamese (VI): "My family's a total bunch of tightwads. They've probably got money to spare, why not be generous with it. I bet my Dad and Grandfather are both just being really tight."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我家也真夠摳門嘞。反正也應該有余錢嘛，那大大方方地借出來不就好啦。我爸和爺爺他們，肯定又是在絮絮叨叨地裝派頭吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我家也真够抠门嘞。反正也应该有余钱嘛，那大大方方地借出来不就好啦。我爸和爷爷他们，肯定又是在絮絮叨叨地装派头吧。」
Indonesian (IDN): "My family's a total bunch of tightwads. They've probably got money to spare, why not be generous with it. I bet my Dad and Grandfather are both just being really tight."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Anche la mia famiglia è totalmente avara. Nonostante probabilmente ci sia anche del denaro in più, e potrebbero gentilmente prestarlo. Mio Padre e il Nonno probabilmente si comporteranno cocciutamente."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Anche i miei sono degli spilorci. Abbiamo tutto quel denaro che ci avanza, quindi perché non essere più generosi coi prestiti? Ad ogni modo, papà e il nonno faranno una scenata, e chi li smuoverà più."
Turkish (TR): "Ailem tamamen cimri. Muhtemelen harcayacak paraları vardır, neden cömert olmuyorlar ki? Babam ve büyükbabamın çok cimri olduğuna eminim."

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "It's natural to be prudent when lending money. Of course, my father will use what he borrows to expand his business, and he came with a plan that promises a solid probability of repayment. Everything else is left up to the presentation.
Umineko Project (UP): "It's natural to be prudent when lending money. Of course, my father has come with a plan by which he can expand his business with what he borrows, and which he can definitely repay. Everything else will be up to the presentation."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It's natural to be prudent when lending money. Of course, my father will use what he borrows to expand his business, and he came with a plan that could be refused. Everything else is left up to the presentation.
PC Japanese (JP): 「お金を貸す時、慎重になるのは当然のことだよ。もちろんうちの父さんも、借り入れた分で事業を拡大し、しっかり返却できるプランを持って訪れてる。あとはプレゼンテーション次第ってところだろうね。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お金を貸す時、慎重になるのは当然のことだよ。もちろんうちの父さんも、借り入れた分で事業を拡大し、しっかり返却できるプランを持って訪れてる。あとはプレゼンテーション次第ってところだろうね」
Russian (RU): "Когда даёшь в кредит, естественно быть бережливым и расчётливым. Разумеется, мой отец будет использовать полученный займ для расширения своего бизнеса, и он пришел с бизнес‐планом, который могут отвергнуть. Всё остальное уже зависит от презентации."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É natural ser prudente quando se empresta dinheiro. É claro, meu pai pensou em um plano no qual ele pode expandir seu negócio com o que ele conseguir emprestado, de modo que ele consiga pagar depois. Todo o resto caberá à apresentação."
Vietnamese (VI): "It's natural to be prudent when lending money. Of course, my father has come with a plan by which he can expand his business with what he borrows, and which he can definitely repay. Everything else will be up to the presentation."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「借人錢的時候，會慎之又慎是理所當然的啊。當然我爸也是帶著用借來的錢擴大生意，並能如數還清的企劃方案而到訪的。接下來就看陳述得如何了吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「借人钱的时候，会慎之又慎是理所当然的啊。当然我爸也是带着用借来的钱扩大生意，并能如数还清的企划方案而到访的。接下来就看陈述得如何了吧。」
Indonesian (IDN): "It's natural to be prudent when lending money. Of course, my father has come with a plan by which he can expand his business with what he borrows, and which he can definitely repay. Everything else will be up to the presentation."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È naturale essere prudenti quando si presta del denaro. Ovviamente, mio Padre userà ciò che prende in prestito per ingrandire i suoi affari, ed è venuto con un progetto che potrebbe essere rifiutato. Il resto sta nel modo in cui viene presentato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "È normale essere accorti quando si presta del denaro. Ovviamente, con la porzione che mio padre prenderà in prestito, lui espanderà i suoi affari, ed è venuto con un progetto che quasi ne garantirà la restituzione. Il resto dipenderà dalla presentazione..."
Turkish (TR): "Borç para verirken temkinli olmak doğaldır. Tabii ki babam aldığı borçla işini büyütebileceği ve kesinlikle geri ödeyebileceği bir planla geldi. Geri kalan her şey sunuma bağlı."

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): ...But I really wish I could watch from the corner and learn. Mother chased me out. I'm a little let down."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Really, I would have liked to watch alongside and learn. But Mother chased me out. I'm a little let down."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......But I really wish I could watch from the corner and learn. Mother chased me out. I'm a little let down."
PC Japanese (JP): ……本当は脇で見させてもらって勉強したいんだけど。母さんに追い出されちゃったんだよ。ちょっと残念かな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……本当は脇で見させてもらって勉強したいんだけど。母さんに追い出されちゃったんだよ。ちょっと残念かな」
Russian (RU): "......Но мне на самом деле жаль, что я не смог понаблюдать где‐нибудь в уголке, чтобы поучиться. Мама выставила меня, так что тут я малость пролетел."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Realmente, eu teria gostado de ficar para assistir e aprender. Mas minha mãe me expulsou. Isso me deixa um pouco chateado."
Vietnamese (VI): "......Really, I would have liked to watch alongside and learn. But Mother chased me out. I'm a little let down."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……說真的我挺想在邊上看著，好好學學的。可惜被媽媽趕出來了。稍微有點遺憾呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……说真的我挺想在边上看着，好好学学的。可惜被妈妈赶出来了。稍微有点遗憾呢。」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Really, I would have liked to watch alongside and learn. But Mother chased me out. I'm a little let down."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma avrei davvero voluto guardarli da un angolo e imparare. Mia Madre mi ha cacciato via. Sono un po' deluso."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Avrei davvero voluto guardare da un angolino per imparare qualcosa.{n}Mia madre mi ha fatto uscire via. Mi sento un po' deluso."
Turkish (TR): "......Aslında ben de bunu kenardan izlemek ve öğrenmek isterdim. Ama annem beni kovdu. Biraz hayal kırıklığına uğradım."

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "...It seems the Master still tends to scold Krauss-sama and Eva-sama as if they were kids. I'm sure she didn't want to let her son see that."
Umineko Project (UP): "......It seems that the Master still scolds Krauss‐sama and Eva‐sama in just the same way he did when they were kids. I'm sure she didn't want to show that to you, her son."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......It seems that the Master still scolds Krauss-sama and Eva-sama as though they haven't changed since they were kids. I'm sure she didn't want to show that to her son, George-sama."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……お館様は、蔵臼さまや絵羽さまのことを、今でも子どもの頃とまったく変わらないように叱られるようです。そんな姿を息子の譲治さまに、きっと見せたくないのでしょう。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……お館様は、蔵臼さまや絵羽さまのことを、今でも子どもの頃とまったく変わらないように叱られるようです。そんな姿を息子の譲治さまに、きっと見せたくないのでしょう」
Russian (RU): "......Похоже, что господин всё ещё ругает Краусса‐сама и Еву‐сама за то, что они будто не изменились с того времени, когда были детьми. Я уверена, ей не хотелось, чтобы её сын стал свидетелем подобного, Джордж‐сама."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Parece que o Mestre ainda repreende o Krauss‐sama e a Eva‐sama, exatamente da mesma forma que ele fazia quando eles eram crianças. Tenho certeza que ela não queria que você, filho dela, visse isso."
Vietnamese (VI): "......It seems that the Master still scolds Krauss‐sama and Eva‐sama in just the same way he did when they were kids. I'm sure she didn't want to show that to you, her son."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……老爺好像即便到了今日，仍會以對待兒時的他們的態度訓斥藏臼主人和繪羽夫人。夫人一定是不願把自己這副樣子，給身為兒子的讓治少爺您看到吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……老爷好像即便到了今日，仍会以对待儿时的他们的态度训斥藏臼主人和绘羽夫人。夫人一定是不愿把自己这副样子，给身为儿子的让治少爷您看到吧。」
Indonesian (IDN): "......It seems that the Master still scolds Krauss‐sama and Eva‐sama in just the same way he did when they were kids. I'm sure she didn't want to show that to you, her son."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Sembra che il padrone rimproveri ancora Krauss-sama ed Eva-sama come se non fossero cambiati da quando erano bambini. Sono sicuro che lei non lo volesse far vedere al proprio figlio George-sama."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Pare che il padrone rimproveri il signor Klaus e la signora Eva esattamente come se fossero ancora dei bambini. Sono certa che non voleva che suo figlio la vedesse in quello stato."
Turkish (TR): "......Efendi görünüşe göre hala Krauss-sama ve Eva-sama'yı çocukken olduğu gibi azarlıyor. Eminim bunu senin, yani oğlunun görmesini istememiştir."

Steam (ST): As Shannon hung her head, she thought back on a scene familiar to those who worked in the mansion.
Umineko Project (UP): As Shannon hung her head, she thought back on those scenes she had grown used to seeing while working in the mansion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As Shannon hung her head, she thought back on a scene familiar to those who worked in the mansion.
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音は俯きながら、普段、屋敷に仕えながら見慣れた光景を思い返す。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 紗音は俯きながら、普段、屋敷に仕えながら見慣れた光景を思い返す。
Russian (RU): Шаннон опустила голову, мысленно возвращаясь к сцене, знакомой тем, кто работал в особняке.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto Shannon baixava sua cabeça, ela lembrava das cenas que estava acostumada a presenciar na mansão.
Vietnamese (VI): As Shannon hung her head, she thought back on those scenes she had grown used to seeing while working in the mansion.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音低著頭，想起了平常在大屋工作時看慣了的情景。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音低着头，想起了平常在大屋工作时看惯了的情景。
Indonesian (IDN): As Shannon hung her head, she thought back on those scenes she had grown used to seeing while working in the mansion.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Chinando la testa, Shannon ripensò a scene che, per chi lavorava alla villa, erano frequenti.

Steam (ST): Even Krauss, who acted haughtily towards his siblings, was still treated like a child by Kinzo.
Umineko Project (UP): Even Krauss, who acted haughtily towards his siblings, was still treated like a child by Kinzo.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even Krauss, who acted haughtily towards his siblings, was still treated like a child by Kinzo.
PC Japanese (JP): 兄弟たちに尊大な態度で振舞う蔵臼ですら、金蔵の前では、未だに子ども扱いなのである。

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "Yes, I imagine so. ...Maybe figuring that out and staying away is part of a child's duty. ......Aaah! That aside, the flowers in this garden are truly splendid this year."
Umineko Project (UP): "Probably. ...Realizing that and going away may be my duty as her child. ......Welllll! All that aside, the flowers in this garden are truly splendid this year, aren't they?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Probably. ...Realizing that and going away may be a child's duty. ......We-ll! Even so, the flowers in this garden are truly splendid this year."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうだろうね。…それを察して姿を消すのも、子どもの務め、かな。……うーん！　それにしても、今年もこの庭園の花は本当に素敵だね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうだろうね。…それを察して姿を消すのも、子どもの務め、かな。……うーん！　それにしても、今年もこの庭園の花は本当に素敵だね」
Russian (RU): "Вполне возможно. ...Понять подобное и удалиться — в этом и заключается обязанность ребёнка. ......Ну‐с! Пусть даже и так, но цветы в саду в этом году выдались просто замечательные."

Vietnamese (VI): "Probably. ...Realizing that and going away may be my duty as her child. ......Welllll! All that aside, the flowers in this garden are truly splendid this year, aren't they?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「應該就是這樣吧。…也許體諒到這點不現身，也是身為小孩的義務吧。……嗯——！說起來，今年這庭園裡的花兒真是好美呀。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「应该就是这样吧。…也许体谅到这点不现身，也是身为小孩的义务吧。……嗯——！说起来，今年这庭园里的花儿真是好美呀。」

PC Japanese (JP): 赤面して黙り込む紗音を、朱志香は面白そうに茶化す。譲治にその経緯はわからないが、自分も同じように笑い、自然に輪に入るのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 赤面して黙り込む紗音を、朱志香は面白そうに茶化す。{n}譲治にその経緯はわからないが、自分も同じように笑い、自然に輪に入るのだった。
Russian (RU): Джессика посмеивалась над Шаннон, в то время как та стояла вся раскрасневшаяся.{n}Джордж не знал подробностей состоявшегося между ними разговора, но тоже искренне рассмеялся вместе с Джессикой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Jessica fazia troça de Shannon, enquanto ela permanecia calada, com o rosto corado.{n}George não sabia dos detalhes, mas naturalmente se juntou a ela, rindo naturalmente.
Vietnamese (VI): Jessica made fun of Shannon as she remained silent, red‐faced.{n}George didn't know the details, but he naturally joined in, laughing the same way.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 朱志香煞是有趣地逗著紅著臉說不出話的紗音。{n}讓治雖不明原委，但也同樣笑了起來，頗為自然地融入了進去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 朱志香煞是有趣地逗着红着脸说不出话的纱音。{n}让治虽不明原委，但也同样笑了起来，颇为自然地融入了进去。
Indonesian (IDN): Jessica made fun of Shannon as she remained silent, red‐faced.{n}George didn't know the details, but he naturally joined in, laughing the same way.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Jessica prese in giro Shannon come questa rimase in silenzio, rossa in faccia. George non conosceva i dettagli, ma si unì spontaneamente, ridendo allo stesso modo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Jessica prese in giro Shannon, che rimase in silenzio per l'imbarazzo.{n}George non aveva capito il contesto, ma si aggiunse comunque al coro, ridendo nello stesso modo.
Turkish (TR): Jessica, Shannon'un yüzü kıpkırmızı olmuş bir halde sessiz kalmasıyla dalga geçti.{n}George ayrıntıları bilmiyordu ama doğal olarak o da aynı şekilde gülerek ona katıldı.

Steam (ST): The three of them lazily walked around the garden, catching up on recent events.
Umineko Project (UP): The three of them lazily walked around the garden, talking about what was new.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The three of them lazily walked around the garden, talking about what was new.
PC Japanese (JP): ３人は、それぞれの近況を語り合いながら、庭園をのんびり歩き回った。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ３人は、それぞれの近況を語り合いながら、庭園をのんびり歩き回った。
Russian (RU): Их троица лениво бродила по саду, обсуждая всё новое.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os três preguiçosamente caminhavam pelo jardim, conversando sobre as novidades.
Vietnamese (VI): The three of them lazily walked around the garden, talking about what was new.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 三人互聊著各自的近況，悠閑地漫步於庭園之中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 三人互聊着各自的近况，悠闲地漫步于庭园之中。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): I tre passeggiarono pigramente intorno al giardino, parlando delle loro ultime novità.
Turkish (TR): Üçü bahçede yavaş yavaş dolaşarak yeni olan şeyler hakkında konuştular.

Steam (ST): George, as the oldest cousin, talked about his life experiences. Jessica talked about recent life on Rokkenjima. And Shannon talked about her recent work.
Umineko Project (UP): George, as the oldest cousin, talked about his life experiences.{n}Jessica talked about recent life on Rokkenjima.{n}And Shannon talked about her recent work.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): George, as the oldest cousin, talked about his life experiences. Jessica talked about recent life on Rokkenjima. And Shannon talked about her recent work.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治なら、いとこの最年長者としての人生経験など。朱志香なら最近の六軒島での生活。そして紗音なら最近の仕事ぶりなど。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 譲治なら、いとこの最年長者としての人生経験など。{n}朱志香なら最近の六軒島での生活。{n}そして紗音なら最近の仕事ぶりなど。
Russian (RU): Джордж, как самый старший кузен, рассказывал о событиях из своей жизни.{n}Джессика рассказывала о событиях недавней жизни на Роккенджиме.{n}И Шаннон рассказывала о своей недавней работе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): George, como o primo mais velho, falou sobre suas experiências de vida.{n}Jessica falou sobre a vida recente em Rokkenjima.{n}E Shannon falou sobre seu trabalho recente.
Vietnamese (VI): George, as the oldest cousin, talked about his life experiences.{n}Jessica talked about recent life on Rokkenjima.{n}And Shannon talked about her recent work.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓治說的，是身為堂兄妹中最年長之人的人生經驗等等。{n}朱志香說的，是最近在六軒島上的生活。{n}而紗音說的，則是最近怎麼工作的等等。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治说的，是身为堂兄妹中最年长之人的人生经验等等。{n}朱志香说的，是最近在六轩岛上的生活。{n}而纱音说的，则是最近怎么工作的等等。
Indonesian (IDN): George, as the oldest cousin, talked about his life experiences.{n}Jessica talked about recent life on Rokkenjima.{n}And Shannon talked about her recent work.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): George, come cugino più vecchio, parlò delle sue esperienze di vita. Jessica parlò della sua recente vita a Rokkenjima. E Shannon parlò dei suoi recenti lavori.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Essendo il cugino più grande, George parlò delle sue esperienze di vita.{n}Jessica conversò sugli ultimi avvenimenti di Rokkenjima.{n}E infine, Shannon raccontò delle sue recenti mansioni.
Turkish (TR): George en büyük kuzen olarak kendi hayat tecrübelerinden bahsetti.{n}Jessica Rokkenjima'daki son yaşamdan bahsetti.{n}Shannon ise son zamanlarda yaptığı işlerden bahsetti.

Steam (ST): They kept going on about these trivial things.
Umineko Project (UP): These silly little topics went round and round in circles.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They kept going on about these trivial things.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そういう他愛もない話がくるくるといつまでもされるのだった。
Russian (RU): Они всё продолжали обсуждать эти повседневные вещи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esses pequenos e tolos assuntos andavam em círculos.
Vietnamese (VI): These silly little topics went round and round in circles.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 你说说我说说，周而复始地聊着这些琐事。
Indonesian (IDN): These silly little topics went round and round in circles.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Loro continuarono a discutere di questi argomenti banali.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Continuarono a discutere di questi argomenti banali.
Turkish (TR): Bu aptalca konular dönüp dolaşıp aynı yere geliyordu.

Steam (ST): Even when Shannon heard the others talk about deeply interesting things, she never felt any particular interest in the actual content of their stories.
Umineko Project (UP): Even when the others' stories had been fascinating, Shannon had never felt particularly connected to their contents.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Shannon, even if she found the others' stories deeply interesting, didn't feel particularly connected to their contents.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 紗音にとって譲治たちの話は、たとえ興味深いものではあっても、その内容に特別な関心を寄せたことはなかった。
Russian (RU): Шаннон, даже если она находила истории Джессики с Джорджем весьма интересными, не чувствовала, что их содержание как‐либо затрагивает её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo quando as histórias dos outros haviam sido fascinantes, Shannon nunca havia se sentido particularmente conectada a seus conteúdos.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 对纱音来说，让治他们讲的事，即使内容引人入胜，她也没有对这些抱有特别的兴趣。
Indonesian (IDN): Even when the others' stories had been fascinating, Shannon had never felt particularly connected to their contents.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Anche se Shannon trovava le storie dei due decisamente interessanti, non catturavano particolarmente la sua attenzione.
Turkish (TR): Diğerlerinin hikayeleri büyüleyici olsa bile, Shannon hiçbir zaman onların anlattıklarına özellikle ilgi duymamıştı.

Steam (ST): She was nothing more than a servant, and she had no intention of delving into her masters' lives.
Umineko Project (UP): She was nothing more than a servant, and she had no intention of delving into her masters' lives.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She was nothing more than a servant, and she had no intention of delving into her master's lives.

Steam (ST): She simply wanted them to enjoy their time speaking with her... and would only pretend to listen intently and nod at the right moments.
Umineko Project (UP): She simply wanted them to enjoy their time speaking with her, and was only pretending to listen intently, and nodding at the right moments.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She wanted them to enjoy their time speaking with her, and was only pretending to listen intently and nod at the right moments.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ただ、自分と会話するという時間を快適に過ごしてもらいたくて、興味深く聞いて相槌を打っているふりをしているだけだ。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela simplesmente queria aproveitar esse tempo no qual eles falavam com ela, e apenas fingia escutar propositalmente, acenando nos momentos certos.
Vietnamese (VI): She simply wanted them to enjoy their time speaking with her, and was only pretending to listen intently, and nodding at the right moments.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Voleva soltanto che loro due passassero dei bei momenti nel conversare con lei, facendo finta di ascoltare con molta attenzione, e annuendo ai momenti giusti.
Turkish (TR): Tek istediği onların kendisiyle konuşmaktan keyif almaları, ve dikkatle dinliyormuş gibi yapıp doğru anlarda başını sallamasıydı.

Steam (ST): But for some reason, the things George talked about today seemed to catch her interest powerfully.
Umineko Project (UP): But for some reason, she found talking with George deeply interesting today.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But for some reason, she found talking with George deeply interesting today.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、なぜか譲治の話が、今日はとても興味深く感じられた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): でも、なぜか譲治の話が、今日はとても興味深く感じられた。

Vietnamese (VI): But for some reason, she found talking with George deeply interesting today.

Steam (ST): Even things she'd normally ignore felt like they contained a trace of kindness behind the words.
Umineko Project (UP): Even for things that she would normally ignore, she felt like she could feel a kindness hidden beneath the words.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even for things that she would normally ignore, she felt like she could feel a kindness hidden beneath the words.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo para coisas que ela normalmente ignoraria, ela sentiu como se pudesse sentir uma gentileza escondida por trás das palavras.
Vietnamese (VI): Even for things that she would normally ignore, she felt like she could feel a kindness hidden beneath the words.

Steam (ST): For some reason, she wanted to know more things about George, no matter how trivial.
Umineko Project (UP): For some reason, she wanted to know more things about George, no matter how trivial.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For some reason, she wanted to know more things about George, no matter how trivial.

Steam (ST): So, ...she stared fixedly at him.
Umineko Project (UP): So...she stared fixedly at him.

Steam (ST): She thought that as far as looks went, this Ushiromiya George... was probably about average and didn't stick out in any particular way.

Steam (ST): But he was diligent, serious, ...and had a deep prudence which allowed him to understand people's hearts and show concern.

Vietnamese (VI): But he was diligent, serious, ...and deeply thoughtful in a way that allowed him to understand people's hearts and care for them.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "You see, marriage isn't something you should enter into only after you start liking someone. You marry first, and then you adjust. If you marry based purely on emotions, you'll always end up regretting it. There's certainly nothing wrong with choosing a person with a secure background for your partner in life, and then developing your affection later."
Umineko Project (UP): "Marriage isn't something you do after you start liking someone. It's something you get used to after you do it. If you marry just based on emotions, you'll definitely regret it. There's definitely nothing wrong with choosing a person with a secure background as your partner in life, and then building up emotions of love."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Marriage isn't something you do after you start liking someone. You fall in love after you do it, right? If you marry just based on emotions, you'll definitely regret it. There's definitely nothing wrong with choosing a person with a secure background for your partner in life, and then building up emotions of love."

Steam (ST): So, I am a being who must feel gratitude for even being treated like a human, and I am not permitted to wish for anything more.
Umineko Project (UP): So I am a being who must feel gratitude for even being treated like a human, and I am not permitted to wish for anything more.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So I am a being who must feel gratitude for even being treated like a human, and I am not permitted to wish for anything more.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だから、人として扱ってもらえたことそのものに感謝するべきであって、それ以上を望むことは許されない存在なのだ。

Steam (ST): In contrast, Lunon cleverly avoided doing extra work whenever it was possible. So, she could complete her jobs with a result that looked almost the same to an outsider, but in a much shorter time. In other words, she was a shrewd employee.
Umineko Project (UP): In contrast, Lunon skillfully cut corners wherever they should be cut.{n}So she could complete her jobs with a result that looked similar to an outsider, but in a much shorter time. In other words, she was shrewd.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In contrast, Runon skillfully avoided important steps wherever she could. So she could compete her jobs with a result looked similar to an outsider, but in a much shorter time. In other words, she was good at cutting corners.
PC Japanese (JP): 対して瑠音は、手を抜けるべきところで上手に抜く。だから傍目にはほとんど遜色のない仕事を、遥かに短時間でこなすように見える。つまり要領がいいということだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 対して瑠音は、手を抜けるべきところで上手に抜く。{n}だから傍目にはほとんど遜色のない仕事を、遥かに短時間でこなすように見える。つまり要領がいいということだった。
Russian (RU): В отличие от Люнон, умело избегавшей ответственных моментов в работе, где это только было возможно.{n}Поэтому она могла выполнять порученную ей работу с таким же результатом на посторонний взгляд, тратя на это гораздо меньше времени. Другими словами, она больше годилась для сглаживания острых углов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em contraste, Runon habilidosamente evitava limpar em qualquer canto que fosse possível evitar. Umineko Project (UP): And yet, her speech was slow and admonishing, which was terrifying beyond measure, and finally made Shannon realize she had said the wrong thing...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And yet, her slow, admonishing style of speech was even more terrifying, and finally made Shannon realize she had said the wrong thing...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "Then perhaps you should aim to do a truly thorough cleaning. Shannon, I order you to clean the reception hall right now. It is an important hall, where several pictures treasured by the Head are displayed, and where honored guests of the Ushiromiya family are welcomed.
Umineko Project (UP): "In that case, you shall clean as thoroughly as you desire. Shannon, I order you to clean the reception hall right now. It is an important hall, where several pictures treasured by the head are displayed, and where honored guests of the Ushiromiya family are invited."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "In that case, aim to do a thorough cleaning. Shannon, I order you to clean the reception hall right now. It is an important hall, where several pictures treasured by the head are displayed, and where honored guests of the Ushiromiya family are invited.
PC Japanese (JP): 「ならば存分に丁寧な清掃を心掛けなさい。紗音、あなたにこのまま大広間の清掃も命じます。当主様の大切な絵画が多数飾られ、右代宮家への賓客をお招きすることもある大切な広間です。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ならば存分に丁寧な清掃を心掛けなさい。紗音、あなたにこのまま大広間の清掃も命じます。当主様の大切な絵画が多数飾られ、右代宮家への賓客をお招きすることもある大切な広間です」
Russian (RU): "В таком случае тебе поручается провести тщательную уборку. Шаннон, я приказываю тебе прямо сейчас заняться уборкой зала для приёмов. Это очень важный зал, где висят несколько очень ценных для главы портретов и куда приглашаются почётные гости семьи Уширомия."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nesse caso, você deve limpar tão minuciosamente quanto desejar. Shannon, ordeno que você limpe o saguão neste momento. É um saguão, onde várias obras apreciadas pelo chefe da família estão exibidas, e onde hóspedes honrados da família Ushiromiya são convidados."
Vietnamese (VI): "In that case, you shall clean as thoroughly as you desire. Shannon, I order you to clean the reception hall right now. It is an important hall, where several pictures treasured by the head are displayed, and where honored guests of the Ushiromiya family are invited."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那你就盡情用心地仔細清掃去吧。紗音，我命令你就照這樣去把大廳也清掃一遍。那大廳裡可是裝飾著多幅當主大人的珍貴繪畫，有時還會用來招待右代宮家的賓客，可謂重中之重。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那你就尽情用心地仔细清扫去吧。纱音，我命令你就照这样去把大厅也清扫一遍。那大厅里可是装饰着多幅当主大人的珍贵绘画，有时还会用来招待右代宫家的宾客，可谓重中之重。」
Indonesian (IDN): "In that case, you shall clean as thoroughly as you desire. Shannon, I order you to clean the reception hall right now. It is an important hall, where several pictures treasured by the head are displayed, and where honored guests of the Ushiromiya family are invited."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "In questo caso, cerca di fare una pulizia accurata. Shannon, ti ordino di andare subito a pulire l'atrio. È una stanza importante, dove sono in mostra alcuni quadri molto importanti per il capofamiglia, e dove gli onorevoli ospiti della famiglia Ushiromiya vengono invitati.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "In tal caso, pulisci pure con tutta la cura che desideri. Shannon, ti ordino di pulire anche l'atrio. È una stanza importante, ornata da numerosi quadri pregiati del capofamiglia, e in cui vengono invitati gli ospiti d'onore della famiglia Ushiromiya."
Turkish (TR): "Bu durumda, istediğin gibi iyice temizleyeceksin. Shannon, sana hemen resepsiyon salonunu temizlemeni emrediyorum. Ushiromiya ailesinin onur konuklarının davet edildiği ve devlet başkanı tarafından değer verilen birçok resmin sergilendiği önemli bir salondur."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): Clean it thoroughly, so that not a speck of dust remains, and so that even you are satisfied. Of course, you will finish before the day is out. Until you finish that and report to me, you will not be permitted any food or rest. Understood?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Clean it thoroughly, so that not a speck of dust remains, and so that even you are satisfied. Of course, you will finish today. Until you finish and report to me, you will not be permitted any food or rest. Understood?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Clean it thoroughly, so that not a speck of dust remains, and so that even you are satisfied. Of course, you will finish today. Until you finish that and report it to me, you will not be permitted any food or rest. Understood?"
PC Japanese (JP): 埃ひとつ残さないよう、あなたが納得するまで丁寧に清掃なさい。もちろん今日中にです。それを終えて私に報告するまで、食事も休憩も許しません。わかりましたね？」

Russian (RU): "Убери там как следует, чтобы и пылинки не осталось, и даже тебе бы не было к чему придраться. Разумеется, ты закончишь сегодня. Пока не закончишь и не сообщишь мне, ты лишена еды и отдыха. Поняла?"

Vietnamese (VI): "Clean it thoroughly, so that not a speck of dust remains, and so that even you are satisfied. Of course, you will finish today. Until you finish and report to me, you will not be permitted any food or rest. Understood?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不要留下一粒灰塵，給我仔細地清掃到令你滿意為止。當然是要在今天內完成。在打掃完向我報告之前，不准吃飯不准休息。明白了嗎？」

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Puliscila accuratamente, così da non far rimanere nemmeno un granello di polvere, e fino a quando anche tu non ne sarai soddisfatta. Ovviamente, finirai oggi. Finché non finisci ciò e non mi fai rapporto, non ti sarà concesso cibo né riposo. Capito?"

Finché non avrai finito e non mi farai rapporto, non ti sarà concesso né di mangiare, né di riposare. Sono stata chiara?"

Turkish (TR): "Bir şey değil."

Steam (ST): Behaving as though her headache was troubling her, Natsuhi headed off down the corridor...
Umineko Project (UP): Natsuhi headed off down the corridor, making a gesture as if her headache was troubling her...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As Natsuhi acted like her headache was troubling her, she headed off down the corridor...
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃は頭痛に障るような仕草をしながら、廊下の向こうに去っていく…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 夏妃は頭痛に障るような仕草をしながら、廊下の向こうに去っていく…。
Russian (RU): Нацухи, ведя себя так, словно её донимала головная боль, направилась по коридору...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Natsuhi seguiu em direção ao corredor, fazendo um gesto como se sua dor de cabeça estivesse atrapalhando‐a...
Vietnamese (VI): Natsuhi headed off down the corridor, making a gesture as if her headache was troubling her...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 夏妃擺出副受困於頭痛的樣子，沿著走廊離去了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 夏妃摆出副受困于头痛的样子，沿着走廊离去了…。
Indonesian (IDN): Natsuhi headed off down the corridor, making a gesture as if her headache was troubling her...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come Natsuhi finse di avere problemi per il suo mal di testa, si diresse verso la fine del corridoio...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Natsuhi si diresse verso il fondo del corridoio, e dai suoi gesti pareva che il suo mal di testa la stesse importunando...
Turkish (TR): Natsuhi baş ağrısı onu rahatsız ediyormuş gibi bir hareket yaparak koridorda ilerlemeye başladı...

Steam (ST): When she couldn't see her anymore, Shannon hung her head and sighed.
Umineko Project (UP): Once Shannon couldn't see her anymore, she hung her head and sighed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When she couldn't see her anymore, Shannon hung her head and sighed.
PC Japanese (JP): その姿が見えなくなってから、紗音は俯き、ため息を吐き出した。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その姿が見えなくなってから、紗音は俯き、ため息を吐き出した。
Russian (RU): Как только она скрылась из виду, Шаннон опустила голову и вздохнула.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma vez que Shannon não podia mais vê‐la, ela abaixou a cabeça e suspirou.
Vietnamese (VI): Once Shannon couldn't see her anymore, she hung her head and sighed.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當看不到她的身影後，紗音低下了頭，嘆了一口氣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当看不到她的身影后，纱音低下了头，叹了一口气。
Indonesian (IDN): Once Shannon couldn't see her anymore, she hung her head and sighed.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando non poteva più vederla, Shannon chinò la testa e sospirò.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quando la sua figura sparì dalla vista, Shannon chinò la testa ed esalò un sospiro...
Turkish (TR): Shannon onu artık göremeyince başını eğdi ve iç çekti.

Steam (ST): ...This was what happened when she had her head in the clouds.
Umineko Project (UP): ......This happened because I let my thoughts take me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......She had been careless, so something like this had happened.
PC Japanese (JP): ……ぼんやりとしているから、こういうことになる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……ぼんやりとしているから、こういうことになる。
Russian (RU): ......Она была неосмотрительна, если позволила такому случиться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Isto aconteceu porque eu deixei meus pensamentos me levarem.
Vietnamese (VI): ......This happened because I let my thoughts take me.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……正因為自己在發呆，事情才會變成這樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……正因为自己在发呆，事情才会变成这样。
Indonesian (IDN): ......This happened because I let my thoughts take me.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Era stata disattenta, perciò una cosa simile era accaduta.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Questo era quello che accadeva quando era distratta.
Turkish (TR): ......Bunlar oldu çünkü düşüncelerimin beni ele geçirmesine izin verdim.

Steam (ST): Even though I'm bad at everything I do, I should be able to at least carry out the cleaning as well as an average person can, right? It's because I can't even perform that very well...that I'm crying so pathetically.
Umineko Project (UP): I might be bad at everything I do, but I should at least be able to carry out the cleaning as well as an average person can, right? I can't even do that properly—it's so pathetic it makes me cry.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even though I'm bad at everything I do, I should be able to at least carry out the cleaning as well as an average person can, right? It's because I can't even perform that well, ...that I'm so shameful and crying.
PC Japanese (JP): 何をやっても不出来な私にとって清掃は、少しは人並みにこなせる仕事だったはずじゃないか。それすらこなせないのだから、…情けなくて涙が零れる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 何をやっても不出来な私にとって清掃は、少しは人並みにこなせる仕事だったはずじゃないか。それすらこなせないのだから、…情けなくて涙が零れる。
Russian (RU): Даже если у меня всё выходит из рук вон плохо, я должна по крайней мере выполнять уборку хотя бы на уровне среднего человека, верно? Именно из‐за того, что я не могу ничего нормально сделать... я просто позорище и плакса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu devo ser ruim em tudo que faço, mas eu deveria ao menos ser capaz de executar a limpeza tão bem quanto uma pessoa comum, certo? Não consigo nem fazer isso apropriadamente — é tão patético que me faz chorar.
Vietnamese (VI): I might be bad at everything I do, but I should at least be able to carry out the cleaning as well as an average person can, right? I can't even do that properly—it's so pathetic it makes me cry.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對什麼都做不好的我來說，清掃本應是一件，我也能稍微完成得跟別人一樣好的工作才對啊。可我卻連這也沒做好，…所以我才會如此沒出息地流下眼淚。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对什么都做不好的我来说，清扫本应是一件，我也能稍微完成得跟别人一样好的工作才对啊。可我却连这也没做好，…所以我才会如此没出息地流下眼泪。
Indonesian (IDN): I might be bad at everything I do, but I should at least be able to carry out the cleaning as well as an average person can, right? I can't even do that properly—it's so pathetic it makes me cry.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche se sono una frana in qualunque cosa faccia, dovrei essere almeno capace di portare a termine le pulizie come una persona normale, giusto? È perché non riesco a fare nemmeno quello... che sono così patetica e piango.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Anche se ero una frana in qualsiasi cosa, avrei dovuto almeno essere capace di portare a termine le pulizie come una persona qualunque, giusto? Aver fallito nel concludere anche quello... mi faceva versare lacrime di vergogna.
Turkish (TR): Yaptığım her işte kötü olabilirim ama en azından temizliği ortalama bir insan kadar iyi yapabilmeliyim, değil mi? Bunu bile doğru düzgün yapamıyorum—o kadar acınası ki ağlamak istiyorum.

Steam (ST): But what's even more shameful...
Umineko Project (UP): And there's something even more pathetic.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): What could be more shameful than this?
PC Japanese (JP): それ以上に情けないのは。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それ以上に情けないのは。
Russian (RU): Что может быть более постыдным, чем это?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E há algo ainda mais patético.
Vietnamese (VI): And there's something even more pathetic.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而比這更沒出息的，
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而比这更没出息的，
Indonesian (IDN): And there's something even more pathetic.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Cosa potrebbe essere più patetico di questo?
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E la cosa più vergognosa...
Turkish (TR): Ve daha da acınası bir şey var.

Steam (ST): Is that, not only have I been unable to perform a single bit of cleaning well, but just now, when Natsuhi was scolding me, ...I imagined that person appearing and rescuing me.
Umineko Project (UP): Not only was I unable to perform a single bit of cleaning well,{n}but just now, when Natsuhi was scolding me............I was envisioning him appearing and rescuing me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Not only have I been unable to perform a single bit of cleaning well, but just now, when Natsuhi was scolding me.........I was envisioning that person appearing and rescuing me.
PC Japanese (JP): こうして、清掃ひとつしっかりこなせないだけでなく。先ほど、夏妃に叱りを受けていた時にも。………あの人が現れて助けてくれないかと夢想してしまったことだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): こうして、清掃ひとつしっかりこなせないだけでなく。{n}先ほど、夏妃に叱りを受けていた時にも。………あの人が現れて助けてくれないかと夢想してしまったことだ。
Russian (RU): Я не только не смогла убраться в одном месте,{n}но теперь, когда Нацухи начала ругаться на меня... Я вообразила, будто тот человек явится и спасёт меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não apenas era incapaz de executar uma boa limpeza, mas ainda há pouco, quando a Natsuhi estava me repreendendo............eu estava imaginando ele aparecendo e me resgatando.
Vietnamese (VI): Not only was I unable to perform a single bit of cleaning well,{n}but just now, when Natsuhi was scolding me............I was envisioning him appearing and rescuing me.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不僅是像這樣，做不好簡簡單單的清掃。{n}而是，就連在剛才受夏妃訓斥之時，………我都還夢想著那個人會不會現身幫我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不仅是像这样，做不好简简单单的清扫。{n}而是，就连在刚才受夏妃训斥之时，………我都还梦想着那个人会不会现身帮我。
Indonesian (IDN): Not only was I unable to perform a single bit of cleaning well,{n}but just now, when Natsuhi was scolding me............I was envisioning him appearing and rescuing me.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non solo non sono stata capace di fare per bene anche solo un poco di pulizia, ma proprio ora, quando Natsuhi mi stava rimproverando... stavo immaginando che quella persona apparisse e mi salvasse.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): era che non solo non ero stata capace di fare per bene neanche un minimo di pulizia...{n}Ma anche che poco prima, quando Natsuhi mi stava rimproverando...{n}stavo immaginando che quella persona apparisse e mi salvasse.
Turkish (TR): Temizliği bile iyi yapamamakla kalmayıp,{n}az önce Natsuhi beni azarlarken............Onun ortaya çıkıp beni kurtardığını hayal ediyordum.

Steam (ST): If only George-sama were here. Would he casually step in and save me?
Umineko Project (UP): If only George‐sama had been here,{n}perhaps he would have casually stepped in and saved me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If only George-sama were here. Would he casually step in and save me?
PC Japanese (JP): もしここに譲治さまがいてくれたなら。さりげなく私を助けてくれただろうか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): もしここに譲治さまがいてくれたなら。{n}さりげなく私を助けてくれただろうか。
Russian (RU): Если бы только Джордж‐сама был здесь.{n}Попытался бы он ненавязчиво вмешаться и спасти меня?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se pelo menos o George‐sama estivesse aqui,{n}talvez ele tivesse casualmente se intrometido e me salvado.
Vietnamese (VI): If only George‐sama had been here,{n}perhaps he would have casually stepped in and saved me.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果讓治少爺在場的話。{n}那他就已不動聲色地幫我解了圍吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果让治少爷在场的话。{n}那他就已不动声色地帮我解了围吧。
Indonesian (IDN): If only George‐sama had been here,{n}perhaps he would have casually stepped in and saved me.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se solo George-sama fosse qui. Sarebbe arrivato lì per caso a salvarmi?
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Se solo ci fosse stato lì il signorino George.{n}Forse mi avrebbe soccorso, facendo finta di niente.
Turkish (TR): Eğer George-sama burada olsaydı,{n}belki de gelişigüzel bir şekilde araya girip beni kurtarırdı.

Steam (ST): Surely he'd show up cheerfully, intentionally acting like he didn't know what was going on, nimbly change the subject, and make me forget I'd ever been rebuked by Natsuhi...
Umineko Project (UP): I'm sure he would show up cheerfully, intentionally acting like he doesn't know what's going on, nimbly change the subject, and make me forget I was ever reprimanded by Natsuhi...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'm sure he would show up cheerfully, intentionally acting like he doesn't know what's going on, nimbly change the subject, and make me forget I was ever rebuked by Natsuhi...
PC Japanese (JP): わざと空気が読めないかのように陽気に現れ、話題をひらりと逸らし、夏妃に叱責していたことすら忘れさせてしまうに違いない…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): わざと空気が読めないかのように陽気に現れ、話題をひらりと逸らし、夏妃に叱責していたことすら忘れさせてしまうに違いない…。
Russian (RU): Я уверена, что он пришел бы весёлым, делая вид, будто ничего не знает, ловко сменил бы тему и заставил меня забыть о том выговоре от Нацухи...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tenho certeza que ele apareceria alegremente, agindo intencionalmente como se não soubesse o que estava acontecendo, rapidamente mudando de assunto, e me fazendo esquecer que fui repreendida pela Natsuhi...
Vietnamese (VI): I'm sure he would show up cheerfully, intentionally acting like he doesn't know what's going on, nimbly change the subject, and make me forget I was ever reprimanded by Natsuhi...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他一定會故意像是搞不清狀況似的，爽朗地出現，輕巧地岔開話題，甚至讓我把夏妃的斥責都一併忘卻…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他一定会故意像是搞不清状况似的，爽朗地出现，轻巧地岔开话题，甚至让我把夏妃的斥责都一并忘却…。
Indonesian (IDN): I'm sure he would show up cheerfully, intentionally acting like he doesn't know what's going on, nimbly change the subject, and make me forget I was ever reprimanded by Natsuhi...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sono sicura si sarebbe mostrato allegramente, fingendo di non sapere quello che stava succedendo, avrebbe cambiato abilmente discorso, e mi avrebbe fatto persino dimenticare di essere mai stata rimproverata da Natsuhi...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ero sicura che sarebbe apparso tutto allegro, in modo da fare la parte dell'ignaro, cambiando abilmente discorso, e avrebbe fatto persino dimenticare a Natsuhi che mi stava rimproverando...
Turkish (TR): Eminim neşeyle ortaya çıkar, kasıtlı olarak neler olup bittiğini bilmiyormuş gibi davranır, konuyu kıvrak bir şekilde değiştirir ve bana Natsuhi tarafından azarlandığımı unuttururdu...

Steam (ST): I kept envisioning him... suddenly appearing from the other side of the door, or the other end of the hallway.
Umineko Project (UP): I kept envisioning him...suddenly appearing from the other side of the door...or the other end of the hallway.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I kept envisioning him, suddenly appearing from the other side of the door, or the other end of the hallway.
PC Japanese (JP): そんな彼が、あの扉の向こうから。あるいは、あの廊下の向こうから、ひょいと現れるところばかりを夢想した。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そんな彼が、あの扉の向こうから。あるいは、あの廊下の向こうから、ひょいと現れるところばかりを夢想した。
Russian (RU): Я всё время воображала, что он может неожиданно возникнуть из‐за двери или в другом конце коридора.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Continuei sonhando com ele...repentinamente aparecendo do outro lado da porta...ou do outro lado do corredor.
Vietnamese (VI): I kept envisioning him...suddenly appearing from the other side of the door...or the other end of the hallway.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從那扇門的另一邊。又或者是從走廊的另一邊。我盡是想像了這樣的他，突然出現時的情景。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从那扇门的另一边。又或者是从走廊的另一边。我尽是想象了这样的他，突然出现时的情景。
Indonesian (IDN): I kept envisioning him...suddenly appearing from the other side of the door...or the other end of the hallway.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Avevo continuato ad immaginarlo, apparendo improvvisamente dall'altra parte della porta, o dall'altro lato del corridoio.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Mi immaginai che sarebbe comparso all'improvviso... dall'altro lato della porta,{n}o dalla parte opposta del corridoio.
Turkish (TR): Onun aniden kapının diğer tarafından...ya da koridorun diğer ucundan belirmesini...hayal edip duruyordum.

Steam (ST): I envisioned the kind of person that would be an appropriate partner for him in a marriage meeting.
Umineko Project (UP): I envisioned the kind of person that would be an appropriate partner for him in a marriage meeting.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I envisioned the kind of person that would be an appropriate partner for him in a marriage meeting.
PC Japanese (JP): そんな素晴らしい彼に相応しいお見合いの相手はどんな人だろうと夢想した。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そんな素晴らしい彼に相応しいお見合いの相手はどんな人だろうと夢想した。
Russian (RU): Я пыталась представить наиболее подходящую для него женщину, с которой он встретился на сватовской встрече.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Imaginei o tipo de pessoa que seria uma parceira apropriada para ele em um encontro de casamento.
Vietnamese (VI): I envisioned the kind of person that would be an appropriate partner for him in a marriage meeting.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 想像了與如此出色的他相配的相親對象會是什麼樣的人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 想象了与如此出色的他相配的相亲对象会是什么样的人。
Indonesian (IDN): I envisioned the kind of person that would be an appropriate partner for him in a marriage meeting.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mi ero immaginata il tipo di persona che potesse essere adatta come compagna per lui in un incontro prematrimoniale.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Mi immaginai che tipo di persona potesse essere una partner di un incontro combinato meritevole di un ragazzo così meraviglioso.
Turkish (TR): Bir evlilik görüşmesinde onun için uygun bir eş olabilecek türden birini hayal ettim.

Steam (ST): And I envisioned how unfitting I was for him.
Umineko Project (UP): And I envisioned how unfitting I am for him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And I envisioned how unfitting I am for him.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、そんな彼に自分はどれほど相応しくないのだろうと夢想した。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そして、そんな彼に自分はどれほど相応しくないのだろうと夢想した。
Russian (RU): И думала, насколько я не подхожу ему.

Vietnamese (VI): And I envisioned how unfitting I am for him.
